name: Santa's Workshop (itch) (ComputerArtClub)
description:
It is Christmas Eve and Santa needs help making toys. Children can have fun reading the story and helping Santa to make toys at Santa's workshop.

This Christmas themed app is an educational but fun animated story and game aimed at children beginning to learn to read English. It teaches children to read by using simple English and lots of repetition.

Each page uses clear text designed to make it easier for children to read and each page contains animations and sounds to keep young children interested and engaged.

Vocabulary focus: toys, clothes and musical instruments.
Grammar focus: make - made

The game element helps to develop memory of the words and make the experience more interactive because children learn better with interactive elements.

This book was written by a teacher with educational principals in mind. Children cannot learn to read alone, this book is designed to be read by parents to their children until the child is able to read by themselves.
